sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
This action retrieves file ID for the given file name from Box account of the associated credentials.

Inputs:

  • File Path - The complete path of the file along with extension which user want to search. E.g. incident/fileName.docx.

Outputs:

  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".
  • File ID - ID of the file. Will be populated in case of success.

Error Messages:

  • Invalid username or password/token.
  • Entered file path is incorrect or associated credentials do not have permissions to access the file on Box.

It takes more than 10 minutes for a new file created in Box to be searchable, so this action will not return results immediately for newly created file. Use this action for existing file that has been created earlier and is older than 10 minutes.

To use this action, the corresponding Box connection and credential must be created and associated with the Box Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

This action retrieves file ID for the given file name from Box account of the associated credentials.

Inputs:

  • File Path - The complete path of the file along with extension which user want to search. E.g. incident/fileName.docx.

Outputs:

  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".
  • File ID - ID of the file. Will be populated in case of success.

Error Messages:

  • Invalid username or password/token.
  • Entered file path is incorrect or associated credentials do not have permissions to access the file on Box.

It takes more than 10 minutes for a new file created in Box to be searchable, so this action will not return results immediately for newly created file. Use this action for existing file that has been created earlier and is older than 10 minutes.

To use this action, the corresponding Box connection and credential must be created and associated with the Box Connection & Credential alias. Learn More
